TopicTitle: Kethane Pack 0.9.2 - New cinematic trailer! - 1.0 compatibility update

Articles.Content: Thanks for the little status update. Keep up the good work ^^
Nice, Taniwha. Your effort is much appreciated, really. You rock.

FWIW simply having it installed hasn't caused any problems for me. The icon shows up fine in the Tracking Station and I can see the overlay. Currently not playing with any mining stuff so can't look at full functionality but doesn't seem to blow up the game at all by itself.

Ok, my Minmus miner finally got to Minmus, mined Ore, converted it to Metal, the Metal to RocketParts and ScrapMetal, ScrapMetal to Metal, built a Kethane miner that drilled Kethane and converted it to MonoPropellant, LiquidFuel, and Oxidizer., all at a site previously scanned by a satellite some time previously (same save, all in 0.90).

In other words, things are working well with only the checked versions (KSP and unity) altered. I'll do up a pull request to send to Majiir, and see what I can do about a working Kethane dll for everyone (though someone else did one, it's buried in the thread and I suspect he didn't do up a pull request).

In other words, things are working well with only the checked versions (KSP and unity) altered. I'll do up a pull request to send to Majiir, and see what I can do about a working Kethane dll for everyone (though someone else did one, it's buried in the thread and I suspect he didn't do up a pull request).

Thank you, that sounds awesome!

Can I ask a longer question though (given that this thread is now well over 500 pages ...)? I last used Kethane extensively in 0.23.5. What mods are you using to scan for, mine, convert and build with Ore (and of course what provides the Metal, RocketParts, etc)? I'd like to add a more full-featured resource system to my end-game these days.

Thank you in advance.

Thank you, that sounds awesome!

Can I ask a longer question though (given that this thread is now well over 500 pages ...)? I last used Kethane extensively in 0.23.5. What mods are you using to scan for, mine, convert and build with Ore (and of course what provides the Metal, RocketParts, etc)? I'd like to add a more full-featured resource system to my end-game these days.

i think it's EL (explanatory launchpads)
found a bug in kethane with the new dll, the drill causes any crafts itsmattached to not load properly and ends up corrupting the craft and attactching the drill then launching, breaks the game
All the menu icons are overlapping each other. Too bad, really like Kethane! Hope it will be updated soon.

how to remove the grid from the main menu screen?

It looks awfully, and I don't know, why it was made.

Yes, I checked FAQ and didn't find the answer there.

http://i29.photobucket.com/albums/c291/Lesser2/screen/KSP/kethane_zps49ad441d.jpg

Add the line ShowInMenu = False to the end of the config file.

Probably still works. It's an easter egg... and I hated it too

Oops, redacted due to recognizing the wrong mod.

The Kethane Pack is maintained and distributed here and on KSP Modders. If you have bug reports, questions or feature suggestions, please post them to the Github issue tracker for the project and follow the bug reporting guidelines.

The Kethane Pack was originally developed by Dani-Sang (concept, models, textures and animations) and Kulesz (plugin). Majiir (that's me) is now managing the project. Keptin created the parts introduced after version 0.1.

It doesn't work for everyone.

It causes more problems than a fix for me

It's working for me - at least old and new crafts with drills are doing their job.

Only thing I noticed is that the Kethan button for the Kethan grid window is showing in the KSC Tracking Station, but not in the in-flight tracking view. Was a bit hard to use the Kethan detector while the button wasn't there and the Kethan window itself was closed and the grid view off

Trying with a completely fresh install of kethane, plus the modified dll that olympic1 supplied.

I found a possible solution for those that can't see the the icon for the kethane grid. For some reason the toolbar icon shows up for me on the tracking station but not during gameplay. Verify if this happens to you as well. If it does, enable the kethane window then jump to one of your crafts from the tracking station and you should be able to see and use it in map view.

You must repeat this step every time you return to the spacecenter.

http://i262.photobucket.com/albums/ii116/domanating/Untitled-5.jpg

Having the same problem as this. Haven't tried the drilling yet because obviously I have to scan for it first.

The overlay in the SCANsat window isn't working either.

Haven't had any problems with the drill, although the scan stuff seems problematic, not sure. Gonna try karbonite.
